snippet.title: [x68000] Spanner X - Endless Fire - Longplay
snippet.description:
Spanner X - Endless Fire is a shoot'em up for the sharp x68000 developed by studio MM in 1993-1994.

The game has 6 stages. Each stage has a final boss.

You can choose what kind of weapon to use before to start a stage. Once you have used that weapon, you can't use it anymore in the other stages.

Thr graphics is not very good while gameplay and musics are good.
